content:
The Meilech Langsam Family from Dynow


From: kutis@netvision.net.il 
Date: Thu, Nov 07, 2013 5:01 am 
To: moishe.miller@totalben.com 

Hello Moishe ,
 
Maybe you can help me....
I saw and search in your family tree site but didn't find.
My garndfather had a brother , Zvi Hersh Rubinfeld born in Lesko 1883.
He married to Sima Langsam from Dynow , born in 1882 to Meilech and Scheindel Langsam.
They didn't have children and they died in the holocaust. 
Perhaps these names familiar to you?
 
Thank's
 
Kuti Sternberg


I would be very interested to hear from anyone with knowledge or an interest in the Miller family.

Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com

My home address is
           1374 East 28th Street
           Brooklyn NY 11210-5311
           USA

Last updated 12/1/2013
